45:   def to_html
46:     html = []
47:     
48:     html << "<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n/* <![CDATA[ */\n"

to_js()

[Source]

    # File lib/google_map_icon.rb, line 31
31:   def to_js
32:     js = []
33:     
34:     js << "var #{dom_id} = new GIcon();"
35:     js << "#{dom_id}.image = \"#{image_url}\";"
36:     js << "#{dom_id}.shadow = \"#{shadow_url}\";"
37:     js << "#{dom_id}.iconSize = new GSize(#{width}, #{height});"
38:     js << "#{dom_id}.shadowSize = new GSize(#{shadow_width}, #{shadow_height});"
39:     js << "#{dom_id}.iconAnchor = new GPoint(#{anchor_x}, #{anchor_y});"
40:     js << "#{dom_id}.infoWindowAnchor = new GPoint(#{info_anchor_x}, #{info_anchor_y});"
41:     
42:     return js.join("\n")
43:   end
